useCase.name: Conduct Inspection
useCase.description: As an Inspector, I want to conduct an inspection, record compliance, and update the inspection status

preconditions.precondition: Inspector must be logged in and assigned appropriate inspections

successEndConditions.condition: All inspection considerations are met, and the inspection status is successfully updated

mainSequence.step: Inspector reviews the list of assigned inspections
Inspector views inspection details and checklist
Inspector validates compliance for each inspection item
Customer is notified of inspection completion
